name: Mighty Light
description:
Objective

You have to defeat the monsters in the dungeon, especially the big one... but be aware, some monsters like to put out the fire and you don't want to be in the dark with monsters, right ? So keep the fire alive !

Which one of you or your friends will have the best time with the least possible "Game Over" ? Let's see that !

How to play
Space : If you want to punch some monsters
C : To drop or pick up your torch, don't forget it !
